definition: an activity that you like or at which you are superior, make concave
details:
noun
- an activity that you like or at which you are superior
= synonyms: cup of tea
- a piece of dishware normally used as a container for holding or serving food
= example: a piece of dishware normally used as a container for holding or serving food
- directional antenna consisting of a parabolic reflector for microwave or radio frequency radiation
= synonyms: saucer, dish aerial, dish antenna
- a particular item of prepared food
= example: a particular item of prepared food
- a very attractive or seductive looking woman
= synonyms: smasher
- the quantity that a dish will hold
= example: the quantity that a dish will hold
= synonyms: dishful
verb
- make concave
= example: make concave
- provide (usually but not necessarily food)
= synonyms: serve up, dish out, dish up, serve
